snippet: Supporters of Melissa Mark-Viverito, Mayor Bill de Blasio’s handpicked candidate, and Daniel Garodnick, her challenger, continued to campaign before the City Council picks its new speaker on Wednesday.
abstract: Supporters of Melissa Mark-Viverito, New York Mayor Bill de Blasio’s handpicked candidate, and challenger Daniel Garodnick continue to campaign before the New York City Council picks its new speaker.

byline.original: By KATE TAYLOR and DAVID W. CHEN

lead_paragraph: Supporters of Melissa Mark-Viverito, Mayor Bill de Blasio’s handpicked candidate, and Daniel Garodnick, her challenger, continued to campaign before the City Council picks its new speaker on Wednesday.

headline.main: Late Lobbying for Support as Speaker Election Nears
headline.print_headline: Late Lobbying for Support as Speaker Election Nears
